select customer.uuid id, customer.user_name , customer.online_state, customer.last_customer_time, customer.last_online_time, customer.auto_answer, u.google_auth_bind, u.remarks, u.`status`, u.user_id from t_customer customer left join tz_sys_user u on u.username = customer.user_name where 1=1
and customer.user_name like CONCAT('%', #{userName}, '%')
order by customer.create_time desc
